content: The talented young chess player is very bold. He deliberately lays himself open to attack, makes himself vulnerable and then checkmates his opponent when least expected.
translations: ita:Il talentuoso giovane giocatore di scacchi Ã¨ molto audace. Lui lascia deliberatamente aperto il campo agli attacchi, si
